name: Blitzkrieg Anthology
notes: This appears to be a DirectX 8c game, frame rate is quite low while testing in the tutorial.
content:
game:
  appid: 313480
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: winxp
    arch: win64
    description: Setting wine to Windows XP
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
winesteam:
  version: staging-3.11-x86_64
